title: After 4 years I have finally reached Gold!
body:
So happy to say that after years of grinding and trying to improve I have finally reached gold!

I never thought I'd be good enough to achieve it (I'm a complete noob), but today, on my first attempt I went 3-2 and won my gold promos. 

My advice (esp. those who aren't mechanically gifted); 
- Stay positive
- Keep learning (esp. map rotations) 
- Never surrender
